src_original: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
anavamardanīyaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
'haiva tvam arhattvaṃ prāpnu hi,  na tvaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ saroyaksaṃbodhau,
na ca tvayānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdho,
subhūte yac cittaṃ niruddham api nu tat punar evotpatsyate.
subhūte yac cittam utpannam api nu tan nirodhadharmi.
subhūtir āha:  nirodhadharmi bhagavan nirodhadharmi sugata.  bhagavān āha:
